recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of canned salmon, drained and flaked| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of bread crumbs| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of onion, finely chopped| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of egg, beaten| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of salt| Measurement; 1; Measure out 1 gram of black pepper| Untimed; None; In a bowl, combine salmon, bread crumbs, onion, egg, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Shape the mixture into patties| Untimed; None; Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat| Timed; 1200; Cook patties in the skillet for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until golden brown| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Grandma's Famous Salmon Cakes
